snippet.title: Hitman: World of Assassination PS VR2 Gameplay Trailer | VR Games Showcase Spring 2025
snippet.description:
Get a fresh look at how Hitman: World of Assassination is shaping up on PlayStation VR2. The PS VR2 version of the game promises to be the most ambitious take on the franchise yet, with the entire WOA trilogy playable inside the headset!

Read more and purchase Hitman on PS5: https://linktr.ee/HitmanVRGS
